alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Putnam; Smith; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 2:23PM CDT until June 11 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Smith County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern De Kalb County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Wilson County in Middle Tennessee... West central Putnam County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 222 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Watertown, or 14 miles southeast of Lebanon, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carthage, Watertown, Gordonsville, Hickman, South Carthage and Alexandria. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 247 and 267. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
